      • findEmployeeById

        public java.util.Optional<Recipe_6_5_Mapping_Optionals.Employee> findEmployeeById(int id)
        Find an Employee by Id. 
         
 return employees.stream().filter(e -> id == e.getId()).findFirst();
        Parameters:
        id - Recipe_6_5_Mapping_Optionals.Employee's id
        Returns:
        Optional<Employee>

      • findingEmployeesByIds

        public java.util.List<Recipe_6_5_Mapping_Optionals.Employee> findingEmployeesByIds(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> ids)
        Finding Employees by Ids. 
         
 return ids.stream().map(this::findEmployeeById) // Stream<Optional<Employee>>
                     .filter(Optional::isPresent) // Remove empty Optionals
                     .map(Optional::get) // Retrieve values you know exist
                     .collect(Collectors.toList());
        Parameters:
        ids - list of Recipe_6_5_Mapping_Optionals.Employee ids
        Returns:
        list of Recipe_6_5_Mapping_Optionals.Employee

      • findingEmployeesByIdsWithFlatMap

        public java.util.List<Recipe_6_5_Mapping_Optionals.Employee> findingEmployeesByIdsWithFlatMap(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> ids)
        Finding Employees by Ids with flatMap. 
         
 return ids.stream()
      .map(this::findEmployeeById) // Stream<Optional<Employee>>
      .filter(Optional::isPresent) // Remove empty Optionals
      .flatMap(optional ->
          optional.map(Stream::of) // Turns nonempty Optional<Employee> into <Optional<Stream<Employee>>
                  .orElseGet(Stream::empty)) // Extracts the Stream><Employee> from the Optional
      .collect(Collectors.toList());
        Parameters:
        ids - list of Recipe_6_5_Mapping_Optionals.Employee ids
        Returns:
        list of Recipe_6_5_Mapping_Optionals.Employee
